title: Enrichment as a a Service
name: EnrichmentasaService
brandDescription: Fiserv, Inc. is a global provider of payments and financial services technology solutions. The Company provides account processing and digital banking solutions, card issuer processing and network services, payments, e-commerce, merchant acquiring and processing, and the Clover cloud-based point-of-sale solution. The Company operates through three segments: Merchant Acceptance (Acceptance), Financial Technology (Fintech) and Payments and Network (Payments).

product.description: A cloud-based service to cleanse and then enrich transactions with additional data attributes, including merchant names, location, merchant logos, categories, transaction type and merchant contact information.
product.longDescription: A cloud-based service to cleanse and then enrich transactions with additional data attributes, including merchant names, location, merchant logos, categories, transaction type and merchant contact information.
